MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report on the Hakkari Zinc Project

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report on the Hakkari Zinc Project
document.description: The mineral properties that form the HZP represent exploration projects with associated risks; however, they have been acquired based on sound technical merit and justify proposed work programs and associated expenditure.
